thread.section_title: WSJ Life, Style & Arts: Weekend News and Reads
thread.title: Top Colleges in the Midwest for Student Engagement

author: wsjcom
title: Top Colleges in the Midwest for Student Engagement
text:
Seven schools with a religious affiliation are among the top 10 colleges and universities in the Midwest for student engagement.
Leading the way is Dordt College of Sioux Center, Iowa, a private school affiliated with the Christian Reformed Church. It ranks No. 1 in the region and nationally for engagement, one of four components of the overall Wall Street Journal/Times Higher Education College Rankings. Its overall national rank is 393.
...
